header_text: Your walking shoes have lost their grip, so you are at the store buying new ones. When you try on the shoes, you have trouble tying the laces. The manager approaches you and offers other options.

elements.Text: Will you be able to buy new walking shoes?

elements.name: Your walking shoes have lost their grip, so you are at the store buying new ones. When you try on the shoes, you have trouble tying the laces. The manager approaches you and offers other options._Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
